This is the mean income within the 3rd decile (tenth of the population).

This is market income. Income here is measured before the payment and receipt of taxes and benefits.

Household income is divided by the total number of household members.
column11: Luxembourg Income Study (2023)
column12: Luxembourg Income Study (LIS) Database, http://www.lisdatacenter.org (multiple countries; 1967-2020). Luxembourg, LIS.
